text:
@NYGovCuomo Hey Andrew Fredo Cuomo why didn't you respect the elderly and then make that stupid order in March 2022 having covid-19 positive patients be admitted to nursing homes? Well?
Think of the deaths that you caused as a result. You're a stupid ass whole stupid a**hole. Resign!
